title: Effects of cultural or tech dev on educ. 1450-1650

content.question: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Analyze the impact of TWO cultural and/or technological developments on European education in the period 1450 to 1650.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Analyze the impact of TWO cultural and/or technological developments on European education in the period 1450 to 1650.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
